title: [Digital Tutors] Introduction to Rotoscoping in Toxik Tutorial-K
description:
[Digital Tutors] Introduction to Rotoscoping in Toxik Tutorial-KTR
===================================================================


PUBLISHER....: Digital Tutors
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Chris Glick
LEVEL.........: BEGINNER
RUNTIME......: 48m 27s
SOFTWARE.....: Toxik 2010


About this course::

In this series of lessons we'll learn the basics of Rotoscoping in Toxik. We'll begin this project by learning about the garbage mask tool. We'll then learn how to easily and quickly control our mask shape and edge feathering using Toxiks powerful Edge Point system. We'll then jump into the basic workflows of animating masks and how we can keep a consistent shape for a more appealing matte. We'll end by outputting our mask into an image sequence that can be used in other applications.



Topics include:

1.Introduction and project overview

2.Drawing masks with the Garbage Mask tool

3.Editing garbage masks

4.Drawing complex masks quickly

5.Creating and using edge points

6.Compositing masks together to create a cutout

7.Animating masks for rotoscoping and changing interpolation

8.Getting the feel of the motion to rough-in keyframes

9.Using Point Consistency to fix edge swimming issues

10.Outputting masks into an image sequence for later use
